name: A Konjyo ST and evaluated NonKone slimes
name_original: A Konjyo ST and evaluated NonKone slimes
description:
A slimes village conflicts against seasonal issues. A player owns the sword, slimes have massive friendly other slimes. Both powers may save their village. Also, new comers, valuable visitors upcoming in a slimes village.

Sorry for in-game texts displayed only in JP languages currently.

In a title text, evaluated NonKone slimes mean slimes were styled in NonKone formed in that app. 

This game includes a boss vs. cooperatively players-slimes battles (and an additive a-village-visitor in some ways) in situations.

Mainly storylines are displayed and boss(es) appear(s) on each static event. 

In other words, grinding your playable character during boss battles mainly.

Basically in this game quick plays required to complete the boss-situation.

A player can gain lvls up to 99 with 6 types of caps up to 45, but bosses appeared in late sessions own lvls in 100 or above. So some consideration will open the door.

I planned the 1st major release in 21 Sep 2021, the 2nd release in Dec, 2021.
